channel.title: Comments on: K’s Top Albums of 2010

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Actually, the front page of the drawer wasn't loading for me because of all the embedded videos, so I added the page break to several of the top ten posts, not just mine. I stand behind my positioning of Teenage Dream. I'm listening to it as I type this.
item.content:encoded: Actually, the front page of the drawer wasn’t loading for me because of all the embedded videos, so I added the page break to several of the top ten posts, not just mine. I stand behind my positioning of Teenage Dream. I’m listening to it as I type this.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: is the strategic use of that "read more" tag in hopes that the click-throughs are lessened so as to avoid owning up to katy perry's position on your list?
item.content:encoded: is the strategic use of that “read more” tag in hopes that the click-throughs are lessened so as to avoid owning up to katy perry’s position on your list?
